description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Gigalith, attacks the target by stomping down on the ground. This move boosts the user's Defense stat.

name: Continental Crush
description: This is a special Z-Move. The user slashes the target with huge, sharp claws.

name: Savage Spin-Out
description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Golisopod, attacks the target with full force. This move boosts the user's Defense stat.

name: Savage Spin-Out
description: The user strikes the target with tough punches as fast as bullets. This move always goes first.

name: Never-Ending Nightmare
description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Marshadow, punches the target with full force. This move boosts the user's Speed stat.

name: Never-Ending Nightmare
description: The user gathers dark energy using its Z-Power and sucks the target into it. The power varies, depending on the original move.

name: Corkscrew Crash
description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Dialga, attacks the target with full force. This move boosts the user's Defense stat.

name: Corkscrew Crash
description: This is a special Z-Move. The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user compared to the target, the greater the move's power.

name: Inferno Overdrive
description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Incineroar, attacks the target with full force. This move boosts the user's Attack stat.

name: Inferno Overdrive
description: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire. This leaves the target with a burn.

name: Hydro Vortex
description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Primarina, attacks the target with full force. This move boosts the user's Special Attack stat.

name: Hydro Vortex
description: The user attacks by shooting water bubbles at the target. This may also lower the target's Speed stat.

name: Bloom Doom
description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Tsareena, attacks the target with full force. This move boosts the user's Attack stat.

name: Bloom Doom
description: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: Gigavolt Havoc
description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Vikavolt, attacks the target with full force. This move boosts the user's Special Attack stat.

name: Gigavolt Havoc
description: This is a special Z-Move. The user attacks everything around it with a shock wave of pure rage. This attack always goes before any other move.

name: Shattered Psyche
description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Tapu Lele, attacks the target with full force. This move boosts the user's Special Attack stat.

name: Shattered Psyche
description: This is a special Z-Move. The user creates a very charming space using its Z-Power and totally toys with the target.

name: Subzero Slammer
description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Alolan Sandslash, attacks the target with full force. This move boosts the user's Attack stat.

name: Subzero Slammer
description: The user attacks everything around it by causing its own brain to explode. This also damages the user.

name: Devastating Drake
description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Kommo-o, attacks the target with full force. This move boosts the user's Attack stat.

name: Devastating Drake
description: The user emits a terrifying roar from its mouth to intimidate the target. This move always goes first.

name: Black Hole Eclipse
description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Alolan Raticate, attacks the target with full force. This move boosts the user's Speed stat.

name: Black Hole Eclipse
description: This is a special Z-Move. The user absorbs its target's HP. The user's HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.

name: Twinkle Tackle
description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Mimikyu, attacks the target with full force. This move boosts the user's Attack stat.

name: Twinkle Tackle
description: This is a special Z-Move. The user attacks with a sinister beam of light. The user can't move on the next turn.

name: Catastropika
description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Pikachu, strikes the target with full force. This move boosts the user's Attack stat.

name: Shore Up
description: The user regains up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP in a sandstorm.

name: First Impression
description: Although this move has great power, it only works the first turn the user is in battle.

name: Baneful Bunker
description: This move protects the user from all effects of moves that target it during the turn it is used, then poisons the attacker.

name: Spirit Shackle
description: The user attacks while simultaneously stitching the target's shadow to the ground to prevent the target from escaping.

name: Darkest Lariat
description: The user swings both arms and hits the target. The target's stat changes don't affect this attack's damage.

name: Sparkling Aria
description: The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles. Any Pokémon suffering from a burn will be healed by the touch of these bubbles.

name: Ice Hammer
description: The user swings and hits with its strong, heavy fist. It lowers the user's Speed, however.

name: Floral Healing
description: The user restores the target's HP by up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP when the terrain is grass.

name: High Horsepower
description: The user fiercely attacks the target using its entire body.

name: Strength Sap
description: The user restores its HP by the same amount as the target's Attack stat. It also lowers the target's Attack stat.

name: Solar Blade
description: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.

name: Leafage
description: The user attacks by pelting the target with leaves.

name: Spotlight
description: The user shines a spotlight on the target so that only the target will be attacked during the turn.

name: Toxic Thread
description: The user shoots poisonous threads to poison the target and lower the target's Speed stat.

name: Laser Focus
description: The user concentrates intensely. The attack on the next turn always results in a critical hit.

name: Gear Up
description: The user engages its gears to raise the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.

name: Throat Chop
description: The user attacks the target's throat, and the resultant suffering prevents the target from using moves that emit sound for two turns.

name: Pollen Puff
description: The user attacks the enemy with a pollen puff that explodes.

name: Anchor Shot
description: The user entangles the target with its anchor chain while attacking. The target becomes unable to flee.

name: Psychic Terrain
description: This protects Pokémon on the ground from priority moves and powers up Psychic-type moves for five turns.

name: Lunge
description: The user makes a lunge at the target, attacking with full force. This also lowers the target's Attack stat.

name: Fire Lash
description: The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This also lowers the target's Defense stat.

name: Power Trip
description: The user boasts its strength and attacks the target. The more the user's stats are raised, the greater the move's power.

name: Burn Up
description: To inflict massive damage, the user burns itself out. After using this move, the user will no longer be Fire type.

name: Speed Swap
description: The user exchanges Speed stats with the target.

name: Smart Strike
description: The user stabs the target with a sharp horn. This attack never misses.

name: Purify
description: The user heals the target's status condition.

name: Revelation Dance
description: The user attacks the target by dancing very hard. The user's type determines the type of this move.

name: Core Enforcer
description: If the Pokémon the user has inflicted damage on have already used their moves, this move eliminates the effect of the target's Ability.

name: Trop Kick
description: The user lands an intense kick of tropical origins on the target. This also lowers the target's Attack stat.

name: Instruct
description: The user instructs the target to use the target's last move again.

name: Beak Blast
description: The user first heats up its beak, and then it attacks the target. Making direct contact with the Pokémon while it's heating up its beak results in a burn.

name: Clanging Scales
description: The user rubs the scales on its entire body and makes a huge noise to attack the target. The user's Defense stat goes down after the attack.

name: Dragon Hammer
description: The user uses its body like a hammer to attack the target and inflict damage.

name: Brutal Swing
description: The user swings its body around violently to inflict damage on everything in its vicinity.

name: Aurora Veil
description: This move reduces damage from physical and special moves for five turns. This can be used only in a hailstorm.

name: Sinister Arrow Raid
description: The user, Decidueye, creates countless arrows using its Z-Power and shoots the target with full force.

name: Malicious Moonsault
description: The user, Incineroar, strengthens its body using its Z-Power and crashes into the target with full force.

name: Oceanic Operetta
description: The user, Primarina, summons a massive amount of water using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force.

name: Guardian of Alola
description: The user, the Land Spirit Pokémon, obtains Alola's energy using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. This reduces the target's HP greatly.

name: Soul-Stealing 7-Star Strike
description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Marshadow, punches and kicks the target consecutively with full force.

name: Stoked Sparksurfer
description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Alolan Raichu, attacks the target with full force. This move leaves the target with paralysis.

name: Pulverizing Pancake
description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Snorlax, attacks the target with full force. This move can also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Extreme Evoboost
description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Eevee, gets assistance from friendly Pokémon and boosts its stats, excluding Speed and Evasion, by one stage.

name: Genesis Supernova
description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Mew, attacks the target with full force. The move's power and effects depend on the item.

name: Shell Trap
description: The user sets a shell trap. If the user is hit by a physical move, the trap will explode and inflict damage on the opposing Pokémon.

name: Fleur Cannon
description: The user unleashes a strong beam. The attack's recoil harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Psychic Fangs
description: The user bites the target with its psychic capabilities. This can also destroy Light Screen and Reflect.

name: Stomping Tantrum
description: Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target. If the user's previous move has failed, the power of this move doubles.

name: Shadow Bone
description: The user attacks by beating the target with a bone that contains a spirit. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

name: Accelerock
description: The user smashes into the target at high speed. This move always goes first.

name: Liquidation
description: The user slams into the target using a full-force blast of water. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

name: Prismatic Laser
description: The user shoots powerful lasers using the power of a prism. The user can't move on the next turn.

name: Spectral Thief
description: The user hides in the target's shadow, steals the target's stat boosts, and then attacks.

name: Sunsteel Strike
description: The user slams into the target with the force of a meteor. This move can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

name: Moongeist Beam
description: The user emits a sinister ray to attack the target. This move can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

name: Tearful Look
description: The user gets teary eyed to make the target lose its combative spirit. This lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

name: Zing Zap
description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Togedemaru, attacks the target with full force. This move's chance to paralyze the target doubles if the user is Electric type.

name: Nature's Madness
description: The user hits the target with the force of nature. It halves the target's HP.

name: Multi-Attack
description: Cloaking itself in high energy, the user slams into the target. The memory held determines the move's type.

name: 10,000,000 Volt Thunderbolt
description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Pikachu, strikes the target with full force. The move's power is doubled if the target is Dynamaxed.

name: Mind Blown
description: The user attacks everything around it by causing its own head to explode. This also damages the user.

name: Plasma Fists
description: The user attacks with electrically charged fists. This move changes Normal-type moves to Electric-type moves.

name: Photon Geyser
description: The user attacks with a pillar of light. This move inflicts Attack or Sp. Atk damage—whichever stat is higher for the user.

name: Light That Burns the Sky
description: This attack inflicts big damage on a target that is hit by it.

name: Searing Sunraze Smash
description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Solgaleo, attacks the target by crashing into it with the force of a blazing sun.

name: Menacing Moonraze Maelstrom
description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Lunala, attacks the target by summoning a maelstrom of moonlight.

name: Let's Snuggle Forever
description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Mimikyu, powers up a bit and raises its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

name: Splintered Stormshards
description: The user, Lycanroc, attacks the target with full force. The user can't move on the next turn.

name: Clangorous Soulblaze
description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Kommo-o, attacks the target with full force. This move boosts the user's Speed stat.

name: Zippy Zap
description: The user attacks the target with bursts of electricity at high speed. This move always goes first and results in a critical hit.

name: Splishy Splash
description: The user charges up power and raises both its Defense and Sp. Def stats. The move can be used three times.

name: Floaty Fall
description: The user floats in the air, and then dives at a steep angle to attack the target. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Pika Papow
description: The more Pikachu loves its Trainer, the greater the move's power. It never misses.

name: Bouncy Bubble
description: The user attacks by shooting water bubbles at the target. It then absorbs water and restores its HP by half of the damage taken by the target.

name: Buzzy Buzz
description: The user shoots a jolt of electricity at the target. This move always goes first and results in a critical hit.

name: Sizzly Slide
description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Glitzy Glow
description: The user bombards the target with telekinetic force. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Baddy Bad
description: The user acts bad and attacks the target. A wondrous wall of light is put up to weaken the power of the opposing Pokémon’s special moves.

name: Sappy Seed
description: The user's body grows all at once, raising the Attack and Sp. Atk stats. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: Freezy Frost
description: The user attacks with a crystal made of cold frozen haze. It eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.

name: Sparkly Swirl
description: The user attacks the target by wrapping it with a whirlwind of an overpowering scent. This also heals all status conditions of the user's party.

name: Veevee Volley
description: The more Eevee loves its Trainer, the greater the move's power. It never misses.

name: Double Iron Bash
description: The user rotates, hitting the target with hard iron horns. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Max Guard
description: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

name: Dynamax Cannon
description: The user unleashes a strong beam from its core. This move's power is doubled if the user is Dynamax.

name: Snipe Shot
description: The user ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon's moves and abilities that draw in moves, allowing this move to hit the chosen target.

name: Jaw Lock
description: This move prevents the user and the target from switching out until either of them faints.

name: Stuff Cheeks
description: The user eats its held Berry, then sharply raises its Defense stat.

name: No Retreat
description: This move raises the user's Defense, Special Defense, and Speed stats by one stage. It also raises the user's Attack stat by two stages, but it then becomes confused.

name: Tar Shot
description: All damage from Fire-type moves done to the target is halved until the target's next turn.

name: Magic Powder
description: The user scatters a cloud of magic powder that changes the target to Psychic type.

name: Dragon Darts
description: The user attacks twice using Dreepy. If there are two targets, this move hits each target once.

name: Teatime
description: The user has teatime with all the Pokémon in the battle. Each Pokémon eats its held Berry.

name: Octolock
description: The user locks the target in and prevents it from fleeing. This move also lowers the target's Defense and Sp. Def every turn.

name: Bolt Beak
description: The user stabs the target with its electrified beak. If the user attacks before the target, the power of this move is doubled.

name: Fishious Rend
description: The user rends the target with its hard gills. If the user attacks before the target, the power of this move is doubled.

name: Court Change
description: The user swaps the effects on either side of the field.

name: Max Flare
description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Max Flutterby
description: This move reduces damage from physical and special moves for five turns. This can be used only in a hailstorm.

name: Max Lightning
description: The user strikes the target with a giant thunderbolt. This move's power is doubled if the target is Dynamaxed.

name: Max Strike
description: The user slams the target with a long tail, vines, or tentacle. The target is also left with paralysis.

name: Max Knuckle
description: This move boosts the user's Attack stat. This move's power is doubled if the target is Dynamaxed.

name: Max Phantasm
description: The user ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon's moves and abilities that draw in moves, allowing this move to hit the chosen target.

name: Max Hailstorm
description: The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns. It damages all Pokémon except Ice types.

name: Max Ooze
description: The user spews a sticky liquid that harshly lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat. This move's power is doubled if the target is Dynamaxed.

name: Max Geyser
description: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water-type moves. It damages all Pokémon except Water types.

name: Max Airstream
description: The user soars up and builds up a huge amount of energy from the Electric and Flying types. This raises the Speed stat of the user and its allies for four turns.

name: Max Starfall
description: The user summons a huge ball of light and hits the target with it. This may also lower the target's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Max Wyrmwind
description: The user ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon's moves and abilities that draw in moves, allowing this move to hit the chosen target.

name: Max Mindstorm
description: The user ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon's moves and abilities that draw in moves, allowing this move to hit the chosen target.

name: Max Rockfall
description: The user summons a huge rock mountain that crashes down on the target. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Max Quake
description: The user summons a giant pillar of earth that crashes down on the target. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Max Phantasm
description: The user ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon's moves and abilities that draw in moves, allowing this move to hit the chosen target.

name: Max Overgrowth
description: The user summons a huge growth of grass that prevents the target from switching out or fleeing.

name: Max Steelspike
description: The user surrounds itself with a great amount of steel spikes and launches them at the target. This may also raise the user's Defense stat.

name: Clangorous Soul
description: The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels the target to mimic it, making the target’s Ability the same as the user’s.

name: Body Press
description: The user attacks by slamming its body into the target. The higher the user's Defense, the more damage it can inflict on the target.

name: Decorate
description: The user sharply raises the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats by decorating the target.

name: Drum Beating
description: The user plays its drum, controlling the drum's roots to attack the target. This also lowers the target's Speed stat.

name: Snap Trap
description: The user snares the target in a snap trap for four to five turns.

name: Pyro Ball
description: The user attacks by igniting a small stone and launching it as a fiery ball at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Behemoth Blade
description: The user becomes a gigantic sword and cuts the target. This move has high critical-hit ratio.

name: Behemoth Bash
description: The user becomes a gigantic shield and slams into the target. This move has high critical-hit ratio.

name: Aura Wheel
description: Morpeko's signature move. The user attacks and switches out with a party Pokémon in waiting. If no other Pokémon can switch out, the user switches out as well.

name: Breaking Swipe
description: The user swings its tough tail wildly and attacks opposing Pokémon. This also lowers their Attack stats.

name: Branch Poke
description: The user attacks the target by poking it with a sharply pointed branch.

name: Overdrive
description: The user attacks opposing Pokémon by twanging a guitar or bass guitar, causing a huge echo and strong vibration.

name: Apple Acid
description: The user attacks the target with an acidic liquid created from tart apples. This also lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: Grav Apple
description: The user inflicts damage by dropping an apple from high above. This also lowers the target's Defense stat.

name: Spirit Break
description: The user attacks the target with so much force that it could break the target's spirit.

name: Strange Steam
description: The user attacks the target by emitting steam. This may also confuse the target.

name: Life Dew
description: The user scatters mysterious water around and restores the HP of itself and its ally Pokémon in the battle.

name: Obstruct
description: The user lies in wait with its sights set on the target. It reduces the target's Speed stat.

name: False Surrender
description: The user pretends to bow its head, but then it stabs the target with its disheveled hair. This attack never misses.

name: Meteor Assault
description: The user attacks wildly with its thick leek. The user can't move on the next turn, because the force of this move makes it stagger.

name: Eternabeam
description: This is Eternatus's exclusive move. The user fires an electric blast like a cannon to inflict damage and cause paralysis.

name: Steel Beam
description: The user fires a beam of steel that it collected from its entire body. This also damages the user.

name: Expanding Force
description: The user attacks the target with its psychic power. This move's power goes up and damages all opposing Pokémon on Psychic Terrain.

name: Steel Roller
description: The user attacks while destroying the terrain. This move fails when the ground hasn't turned into a terrain.

name: Scale Shot
description: The user attacks by shooting scales two to five times in a row. This move boosts the user's Speed stat but lowers its Defense stat.

name: Meteor Beam
description: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers space power and boosts its Sp. Atk stat, then attacks the target on the next turn.

name: Shell Side Arm
description: The user attacks by shooting ink at the target. This may also poison the target. This move is effective on Poison types.

name: Misty Explosion
description: The user attacks everything around it and faints upon using this move. This move's power is increased on Misty Terrain.

name: Grassy Glide
description: This move always goes first on Grassy Terrain. The user glides when it makes its attack.

name: Rising Voltage
description: The user attacks with electric voltage rising from the ground. This move's power doubles when the target is on Electric Terrain.

name: Terrain Pulse
description: The user utilizes the power of the terrain to attack. This move's type and power changes depending on the terrain when it's used.

name: Skitter Smack
description: The user skitters behind the target to attack. This also lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Burning Jealousy
description: The user attacks with energy from jealousy. This leaves all opposing Pokémon that have had their stats boosted during the turn with a burn.

name: Lash Out
description: The user lashes out to vent its frustration toward the target. If its stats were lowered during the turn, the power of this move is doubled.

name: Poltergeist
description: The user attacks the target by controlling the target's item. The move fails if the target doesn't have an item.

name: Corrosive Gas
description: The user surrounds everything around it with highly acidic gas and melts away items they hold.

name: Coaching
description: The user properly coaches its ally Pokémon, boosting their Attack and Defense stats.

name: Flip Turn
description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

name: Triple Axel
description: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successful hit.

name: Dual Wingbeat
description: The user slams the target with its wings. The target is hit twice in a row.

name: Scorching Sands
description: The user throws scorching sand at the target to attack. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Jungle Healing
description: The user regains HP equal to half of its max HP. It restores more HP in a swampy terrain.

name: Wicked Blow
description: The user and the target trade places. The target is hit twice. This move always goes first.

name: Surging Strikes
description: The user, in the current turn, strikes the target three times in a row.

name: Thunder Cage
description: The user traps the target in a cage of sparking electricity for four to five turns.

name: Dragon Energy
description: The user stores power, then attacks. The more the user's stats are raised, the greater the move's power.

name: Freezing Glare
description: The user attacks by glaring at the target in a freezing-cold way. This may also leave the target frozen.

name: Fiery Wrath
description: The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at the opposing Pokémon. This may also make them flinch.

name: Thunderous Kick
description: The user overwhelms the target with lightning-like movement before delivering a kick. This also lowers the target's Defense stat.

name: Glacial Lance
description: The user attacks by hurling a blizzard-cloaked icicle lance at the target. This move always goes first on Hail.

name: Astral Barrage
description: The user attacks by sending a frightful amount of small ghosts at opposing Pokémon.

name: Eerie Spell
description: The user attacks with its tremendous psychic power. This also drains 3 PP from the move last used by the target.

name: Dire Claw
description: The user lashes out at the target with ruinous claws. This may also leave the target poisoned, paralyzed, or asleep.

name: Psychield Bash
description: Cloaking itself in psychic energy, the user slams into the target. This also boosts the user's Defense stat.

name: Power Shift
description: The user swaps its Attack and Defense stats.

name: Stone Axe
description: The user swings its stone axes at the target. Stone splinters left behind by this attack float around the target.

name: Springtide Storm
description: The user attacks by wrapping opposing Pokémon in fierce winds brimming with love and hate. This may also lower their Attack stats.

name: Mystical Power
description: The user attacks by emitting a mysterious power. This also boosts the user's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Raging Fury
description: The user rampages around spewing flames for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

name: Wave Crash
description: The user shrouds itself in water and slams into the target with its whole body to inflict damage. This also damages the user quite a lot.

name: Chloroblast
description: The user launches its amassed chlorophyll to inflict damage on the target. This also damages the user.

name: Mountain Gale
description: The user hurls giant chunks of ice at the target to inflict damage. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Victory Dance
description: The user performs an intense dance to usher in victory, boosting its Attack, Defense, and Speed stats.

name: Headlong Rush
description: The user smashes into the target in a full-body tackle. This also lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def stats.

name: Barb Barrage
description: The user launches countless toxic barbs to inflict damage. This may also poison the target. This move's power is doubled if the target is already poisoned.

name: Esper Wing
description: The user slashes the target with aura-enriched wings. This also boosts the user's Speed stat. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

name: Bitter Malice
description: The user attacks the target with spine-chilling resentment. This also lowers the target's Attack stat.

name: Shelter
description: The user makes its skin as hard as an iron shield, sharply boosting its Defense stat.

name: Triple Arrows
description: The user kicks, then fires three arrows. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit and may also lower the target's Defense stat or make it flinch.

name: Infernal Parade
description: The user attacks with myriad fireballs. This may also leave the target with a burn. This move's power is doubled if the target has a status condition.

name: Ceaseless Edge
description: The user slashes its shell blade at the target. Shell splinters left behind by this attack remain scattered under the target as spikes.

name: Bleakwind Storm
description: The user attacks with savagely cold winds that cause both body and spirit to tremble. This may also lower the Speed stats of opposing Pokémon.

name: Wildbolt Storm
description: The user summons a thunderous tempest and savagely attacks with lightning and wind. This may also leave opposing Pokémon with paralysis.

name: Sandsear Storm
description: The user attacks by wrapping opposing Pokémon in fierce winds and searingly hot sand. This may also leave them with a burn.

name: Lunar Blessing
description: The user receives a blessing from the crescent moon, restoring HP and curing status conditions for itself and its ally Pokémon currently in the battle.

name: Take Heart
description: The user lifts its spirits, curing its own status conditions and boosting its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

name: Tera Blast
description: If the user has Terastallized, it unleashes energy of its Tera Type. This move inflicts damage using the Attack or Sp. Atk stat—whichever is higher for the user.

name: G-Max Wildfire
description: A Fire-type attack that Gigantamax Charizard use. This move continues to deal damage to opponents for four turns.

name: G-Max Befuddle
description: A Bug-type attack that Gigantamax Butterfree use. This move spreads paralysis, poison, or sleep to opponents.

name: G-Max Chi Strike
description: A Fighting-type attack that Gigantamax Machamp use. This move raises the chance of critical hits.

name: G-Max Cuddle
description: A Normal-type attack that Gigantamax Eevee use. This move causes opponents to become infatuated.

name: G-Max Depletion
description: A Dragon-type attack that Gigantamax Duraludon use. This move lowers the PP of the last move used by opponents.

name: G-Max Drum Solo
description: A Normal-type attack that Gigantamax Rillaboom use. This move raises the Speed stat of allies.

name: G-Max Finale
description: A Fairy-type attack that Gigantamax Alcremie use. This move heals the HP of allies.

name: G-Max Fireball
description: A Fire-type attack that Gigantamax Cinderace use. This move can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

name: G-Max Foam Burst
description: A Water-type attack that Gigantamax Kingler use. This move harshly lowers opponents' Speed.

name: G-Max Gold Rush
description: A Normal-type attack that Gigantamax Meowth use. This move scatters coins.

name: G-Max Gravitas
description: A Psychic-type attack that Gigantamax Orbeetle use. This move affects gravity for five turns.

name: G-Max Hydrosnipe
description: A Water-type attack that Gigantamax Inteleon use. This move ignores the effects of opponents' moves.

name: G-Max Malodor
description: A Poison-type attack that Gigantamax Garbodor use. This move poisons opponents.

name: G-Max Meltdown
description: A Steel-type attack that Gigantamax Copperajah use. This move traps opponents in a vortex of raging fire for four to five turns.

name: G-Max One Blow
description: A Dark-type attack that Gigantamax Urshifu (Single Strike Style) use. This move becomes a critical hit if the opponent's HP is half or less.

name: G-Max Rapid Flow
description: A Water-type attack that Gigantamax Urshifu (Rapid Strike Style) use. This move attacks two to five times in a row.

name: G-Max Replenish
description: A Normal-type attack that Gigantamax Grimmsnarl use. This move recovers the item it used.

name: G-Max Resonance
description: An Ice-type attack that Gigantamax Lapras use. This move reduces opponents' PP.

name: G-Max Sandblast
description: A Ground-type attack that Gigantamax Sandaconda use. This move buries opponents in a sandstorm.

name: G-Max Smite
description: A Fairy-type attack that Gigantamax Hatterene use. This move confuses opponents.

name: G-Max Snooze
description: A Dark-type attack that Gigantamax Gengar use. This move causes opponents to fall asleep.

name: G-Max Steelsurge
description: A Steel-type attack that Gigantamax Copperajah (Eternamax) use. This move sets up Spikes.

name: G-Max Stonesurge
description: A Water-type attack that Gigantamax Drednaw use. This move sets up Stealth Rock.

name: G-Max Stun Shock
description: An Electric-type attack that Gigantamax Toxtricity (Amped Form) use. This move poisons or paralyzes opponents.

name: G-Max Sweetness
description: A Grass-type attack that Gigantamax Flapple use. This move heals the status conditions of allies.

name: G-Max Tartness
description: A Grass-type attack that Gigantamax Appletun use. This move lowers opponents' Evasion.

name: G-Max Terror
description: A Ghost-type attack that Gigantamax Grimmsnarl (Eternamax) use. This move lowers the Speed stat of opponents.

name: G-Max Volt Crash
description: An Electric-type attack that Gigantamax Pikachu use. This move paralyzes opponents.

name: G-Max Volcalith
description: A Rock-type attack that Gigantamax Coalossal use. This move summons rocks and drops them on opponents.

name: G-Max Wind Rage
description: A Flying-type attack that Gigantamax Corviknight use. This move removes effects of moves like Reflect and Light Screen.

name: G-Max Vine Lash
description: A Grass-type attack that Gigantamax Venusaur use. This move continues to deal damage to opponents for four turns.

name: G-Max Cannonade
description: A Water-type attack that Gigantamax Blastoise use. This move continues to deal damage to opponents for four turns.

name: G-Max Centiferno
description: A Fire-type attack that Gigantamax Centiskorch use. This move traps opponents in flames for four to five turns.
